item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description: Baoqiang Zhan（詹宝强） 1 School of Economics and Management Harbin Institute of Technology Email: bqzhan@outlook.com Competences & Languages Research Interests Consumer behaviors, Information Systems, Business Analytics Research Methods Econometrics, Social Networks, Machine Learning, Deep Learning Skills Data Crawling, Big Data Analysis, Text Mining Programming Python, Stata, MatLab, R, SPSS Tools Scikit-learn, PyTorch, TensorFlow Language IELTS: 6.5 (Writing: 6.0, Listening: 7.0, Speaking: 5.5, Reading: 7.5) Educational Background Sept. 2021 ~ Present, Ph.D. Candidate (Supervisor: Prof.
